text: Carol Vereș (12 April 1926 – 20 February 2017) was a Romanian rower. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo with the men's coxless four where they came ninth. He died on 20 February 2017. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Romanian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Romania Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Sportspeople from Arad Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Romania Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Carol Vereș
